typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as integer,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as integer,
		Rating as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(contains([1950, 1988, 1960], #item == YEAR)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Rating = iif(YEAR==1988,1,toInteger(Rating)),
		YEAR = iif(YEAR==1960,2021,toInteger(YEAR)),
		movies = iif(YEAR==1960,movies+1000,movies),
		Title = Title,
		genresgenregenre = genresgenregenre) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(YEAR==1988),
	insertIf(YEAR==2021),
	deleteIf(YEAR==1950)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movies as integer,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as short,
		Rating as short
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'adftutorial',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Title','YEAR'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		movies,
		Title,
		genresgenregenre,
		YEAR,
		Rating
	)) ~> sink1
